tool_description:
Nexchange is the planet's easiest and fastest way to exchange Cryptocurrency for individuals and businesses alike.
Additionally to a high-liquidity zero-slippage trading, we offer our clients access to valuable market data including over 42 fiat currencies in conjunction with all major cryptocurrencies.
name: Nexchange
title: Nexchange

api_list.name: Get Order
Get Currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nexchange-io-nexchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com/currency/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nexchange-io-nexchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest Ticker

required_parameters.name: pair_name
required_parameters.description: name of exchanged pair i.e. BTCLTC, LTCBTC, ETHBTC.

api_list.name: Get Ticker History
api_list.description: Returns price history for selected pair.

required_parameters.name: pair_name
required_parameters.description: name of exchanged pair i.e. BTCLTC, LTCBTC, ETHBTC.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: how many hours back would you like to get prices for. Amount of hours to check i.e. 0.3 means 18 min, 2 - 2 hours

optional_parameters.name: data_points
optional_parameters.description: how many data points in the selected hour range would you like to get. For example, If you pass 1 hour and data_points=60, you will get 1 data point per minute (our max supported resolution), if you pass hour=1 and data_points=30 you will get one point per 2 minutes.

api_list.name: Get Orders

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: number of orders in one page.

api_list.name: Get User Order
Get User Orders

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: number of orders in one page.

api_list.name: Get Volume

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: how many hours back would you like to get trade Volume for.
